mapper.select: select count(id) totSize from member where corp_status= 1 or corp_status= 2

select m.id, c.corp_name, c.corp_license, c.manager_name, c.manager_phone, c.manager_email from member m join corperation c on m.id = c.id where m.corp_status = 1 or m.corp_status = 2 order by m.corp_status asc limit ${startNo}, ${listSize}
select count(id) totSize from member where mento_status= 1 or mento_status= 2

select m.id, m.join_date, m.email, m.grade, c.career_certificate from member m join career_certification c on m.id = c.id where m.mento_status = 1 or m.mento_status = 2 order by m.mento_status asc limit ${startNo}, ${listSize}
